articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: El Salvador becomes first country to adopt Bitcoin as an official currency
articles.description: Bitcoin is an official currency of El Salvador alongside the US dollar, after it became the first country to adopt the cryptocurrency as legal tender. The country has purchased 400 bitcoins, or around $20.9 million.
